channel.title: CVE Feed for RedHat -- codehaus
channel.description: The latest CVEs for RedHat -- codehaus

item.title: CVE-2019-10202|2024-08-04T22:17:19.913Z -- redhat -- codehaus
item.description: A series of deserialization vulnerabilities have been discovered in Codehaus 1.9.x implemented in EAP 7. This CVE fixes CVE-2017-17485, CVE-2017-7525, CVE-2017-15095, CVE-2018-5968, CVE-2018-7489, CVE-2018-1000873, CVE-2019-12086 reported for FasterXML jackson-databind by implementing a whitelist approach that will mitigate these vulnerabilities and future ones alike.
